data.persona: I spread gossip throughout the kingdom. I wear the finest of clothes. I am always protected from the outcomes of my villainy.
data.description:
You are in the Grand Ballroom.
There is a large marbled floor with ornate inlay-ed floor decorations.  The ceiling is tall and also ornately decorated with beautiful plaster decorations that touches by gold lining.  The space is high and well lit with many windows but has a dark musky smell.
There's a windows, a marbled floor, a decoration, a ceiling, and a floor decorations here.
The waiter and the royal family are here.

You are carrying a flask, and wielding a Daggers.

data.short_motivation: I must get the royal family arrested
data.mid_motivation: I will frame the royal family and make it look they attacked me
data.long_motivation: I will redeem my reward with the rival royal family

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: get reward from rival royal family.
